data_table.description: DCCT_EDIC. De-identified patient ID and consent groups of subjects affected with Type 1 diabetes and involved in the "Diabetes Control and Complications Trial (DCCT) and Epidemiology of Diabetes Interventions and Complications Study (EDIC)" project.

variable.name: CONSENT
variable.value: Subjects did not participate in the study, did not complete a consent document and are included only for the pedigree structure and/or genotype controls, such as HapMap subjects
